basic.floral_language:
Rosa chinensis 
Floriography: glamorous, blessed, enthusiastic
Chinese Rose is the official flower of Tianjing City, blooming year around, also called Yue Yue Hong in Chinese, meaning blossoming every month.
Chinese Roses are shrub plants with many varieties. Leaves have 3-5 leaflets, oval, egg-shaped with smooth coating. Flowers are big, with single flowers born in the top of branches, displaying gorgeous color. For this reason, Chinese Rose is regarded as the Queen of Flowers. 
Chinese Rose likes the sun. Flowers last for 2-3 weeks normally. New sprouts emerge soon after pruning.
basic.blooming: Blooms once every February-March months, viewing period 2-3 weeks
basic.color: Flower color red, pink, yellow, orange

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Likes sunshine, put in sunny places, avoid strong sunlight in summer at noon
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, after flowering remove the upper part staring from 10 cm above soil surface, leaving 3-5 leaves
